verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, to <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%>, whose right <S%H3225>hand<s%> I have <S%H2388>holden<s%>, to <S%H7286>subdue<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him; and I will <S%H6605>loose<s%> the <S%H4975>loins<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%>, to <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him the two leaved <S%H1817>gates<s%>; and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> shall not be <S%H5462>shut<s%>; have: or, strengthened

I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and <S%H3474>make<s%> the crooked <S%H1921>places<s%> <S%H3474>straight<s%> <S%H3474><s%>: I will break in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of <S%H5154>brass<s%>, and cut in <S%H1438>sunder<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>:

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and hidden <S%H4301>riches<s%> of secret <S%H4565>places<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which <S%H7121>call<s%> thee by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, am the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant's<s%> sake, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> mine <S%H972>elect<s%>, I have even <S%H7121>called<s%> thee by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: I have <S%H3655>surnamed<s%> thee, though thou hast not <S%H3045>known<s%> me.
I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and there is none else, there is no <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2108>beside<s%> me: I <S%H247>girded<s%> thee, though thou hast not <S%H3045>known<s%> me:

That they may <S%H3045>know<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, and from the <S%H4628>west<s%>, that there is <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H1107>beside<s%> me. I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and there is none else.

I <S%H3335>form<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%>, and <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%>: I <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>: I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> all these things.

Drop <S%H7491>down<s%>, ye <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, from <S%H4605>above<s%>, and let the <S%H7834>skies<s%> pour <S%H5140>down<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%>, and let them bring <S%H6509>forth<s%> <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, and let <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> spring <S%H6779>up<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1254>created<s%> it.

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto him that <S%H7378>striveth<s%> with his <S%H3335>Maker<s%>! Let the <S%H2789>potsherd<s%> strive with the <S%H2789>potsherds<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>. Shall the <S%H2563>clay<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to him that <S%H3335>fashioneth<s%> it, What <S%H6213>makest<s%> thou? or thy <S%H6467>work<s%>, He hath no <S%H3027>hands<s%>?
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto him that <S%H559>saith<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, What <S%H3205>begettest<s%> thou? or to the <S%H802>woman<s%>, What hast thou brought <S%H2342>forth<s%>?

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and his <S%H3335>Maker<s%>, <S%H7592>Ask<s%> me of things to <S%H857>come<s%> concerning my <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and concerning the <S%H6467>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> ye me.

I have <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> upon it: I, even my <S%H3027>hands<s%>, have stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and all their <S%H6635>host<s%> have I <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

I have raised him <S%H5782>up<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and I will <S%H3474>direct<s%> all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>: he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> my <S%H5892>city<s%>, and he shall let <S%H7971>go<s%> my <S%H1546>captives<s%>, not for <S%H4242>price<s%> nor <S%H7810>reward<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>. direct: or, make straight

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, The <S%H3018>labour<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H5505>merchandise<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> and of the <S%H5436>Sabeans<s%>, <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4060>stature<s%>, shall come <S%H5674>over<s%> unto thee, and they shall be thine: they shall <S%H3212>come<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee; in <S%H2131>chains<s%> they shall come <S%H5674>over<s%>, and they shall fall <S%H7812>down<s%> unto thee, they shall make <S%H6419>supplication<s%> unto thee, saying, Surely <S%H410>God<s%> is in thee; and there is none else, there is <S%H657>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.
<S%H403>Verily<s%> thou art a <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5641>hidest<s%> thyself, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H3467>Saviour<s%>.

They shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, and also <S%H3637>confounded<s%>, all of them: they shall <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H3639>confusion<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> that are <S%H2796>makers<s%> of <S%H6736>idols<s%>.

But <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%>: ye shall not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> nor <S%H3637>confounded<s%> <S%H5769>world<s%> without <S%H5703>end<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; <S%H430>God<s%> himself that <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> it; he hath <S%H3559>established<s%> it, he <S%H1254>created<s%> it not in <S%H8414>vain<s%>, he <S%H3335>formed<s%> it to be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and there is none else.

I have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H5643>secret<s%>, in a <S%H2822>dark<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: I <S%H559>said<s%> not unto the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H1245>Seek<s%> ye me in <S%H8414>vain<s%>: I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, I <S%H5046>declare<s%> things that are <S%H4339>right<s%>.

<S%H6908>Assemble<s%> yourselves and <S%H935>come<s%>; draw <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, ye that are <S%H6412>escaped<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: they have no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> that set <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of their graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto a <S%H410>god<s%> that cannot <S%H3467>save<s%>.

<S%H5046>Tell<s%> ye, and bring them <S%H5066>near<s%>; yea, let them take <S%H3289>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>: who hath <S%H8085>declared<s%> this from ancient <S%H6924>time<s%>? who hath <S%H5046>told<s%> it from that time? have not I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? and there is no <S%H430>God<s%> else <S%H1107>beside<s%> me; a <S%H6662>just<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> and a <S%H3467>Saviour<s%>; there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H2108>beside<s%> me.
<S%H6437>Look<s%> unto me, and be ye <S%H3467>saved<s%>, all the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: for I am <S%H410>God<s%>, and there is none else.

I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by myself, the <S%H1697>word<s%> is gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and shall not <S%H7725>return<s%>, That unto me every <S%H1290>knee<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow<s%>, every <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H7650>swear<s%>.

Surely, shall one <S%H559>say<s%>, in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have I <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H5797>strength<s%>: even to him shall men <S%H935>come<s%>; and all that are <S%H2734>incensed<s%> against him shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>. Surely: or, Surely he shall say of me, In the LORD is all righteousness and strength righteousness: Heb. righteousnesses
In the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall all the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H6663>justified<s%>, and shall <S%H1984>glory<s%>.
